Package uk.ac.ebi.utils.regex

Class RegEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.utils.regex.RegEx
  • public class RegEx
extends Object
    An helper class for the regex library. Easier calls to the RE functions, plus caching of the pattern, which may speed up your code.
    Author:
    brandizi, copied from the library org.brandizi.jutils.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RegEx​(String pattern)
      Creates and store a new Pattern, calling Pattern.compile(String)
      RegEx​(String pattern, int flags)
      Creates and store a new Pattern, calling Pattern.compile(String, int)
